> TsUp shared configuration

## Installation

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (PKG_JSON:template=```console\nnpm install --save-dev ${name}\n```) -->
```console
npm install --save-dev @captive/tsup-config
```
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->

## Usage

In the `tsup.config.ts` for your project

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (PKG_JSON:template=```js\nimport {} from '${name}';\nexport default defineConfig();\n```) -->
```js
import {} from '@captive/tsup-config';
export default defineConfig();
```
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->
